content:
Great question! Here are some potential bonuses that could be included in this course:

1. Access to a private community: Provide access to a private online community where students can connect with other digital artists, share their work, and get feedback and support from like-minded individuals.
2. Templates and resources: Offer a collection of templates, graphics, and other digital resources that students can use in their own digital art creations. This could include pre-made backgrounds, brushes, fonts, and more.
3. Live Q&A sessions: Schedule live Q&A sessions where students can ask questions and get personalized feedback from the instructor. This is a great way to provide additional support and guidance throughout the course.
4. Guest expert interviews: Bring in guest experts to share their insights and expertise on topics related to digital art creation and selling. This could include successful digital artists, marketing experts, and more.
5. Workbooks and exercises: Provide workbooks and exercises that help students apply the concepts and techniques covered in the course to their own digital art creations. This can help students deepen their understanding and build their skills more effectively.
6. Personalized portfolio review: Offer a personalized portfolio review where students can get feedback and guidance on their digital art creations. This can be a valuable way to identify areas for improvement and get advice on how to take their digital art to the next level.

By including these types of bonuses, you can add value to your course and make it more attractive to potential students. Bonuses also help to deepen the learning experience and provide additional support and guidance to students as they work through the course.
